H0.text: What nickname has been given to the Velodrome in the Olympic Park because of the shape of its roof. The Curl

H1.text: What nickname has been given to the Velodrome in the Olympic Park because of the shape of its roof. The Dome

H2.text: What nickname has been given to the Velodrome in the Olympic Park because of the shape of its roof. The Saddle

H3.text: What nickname has been given to the Velodrome in the Olympic Park because of the shape of its roof. Pringle

A4.text: It is informally known as 'The Pringle' due to its distinctive shape.
